price: 3. Ir pasitikėk Allahu ir Pakankamas yra Allahas kaip Vakil (Globėjas arba Reikalų Tvarkytojas).
arabic: وَتَوَكَّلۡ عَلَى ٱللَّهِۚ وَكَفَىٰ بِٱللَّهِ وَكِيلٗا

version.title: Lithuanian Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Lithuanian By Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: watawakkal ʿalā al-lahi wakafā bil-lahi wakīlan
